article.description: — Mike Bothwell had 26 points as Furman easily defeated College of Charleston 81-57 on Saturday.
article.headline: Bothwell leads Furman over College of Charleston 81-57
article.linkText: Bothwell leads Furman over College of Charleston 81-57
article.story: CHARLESTON, S.C. -- — Mike Bothwell had 26 points as Furman easily defeated College of Charleston 81-57 on Saturday. Noah Gurley had 18 points and three blocks for Furman (4-0). Jalen Slawson added 16 points, 10 rebounds, nine assists and three blocks. Bothwell shot 6 for 8 on 3-pointers. Zep Jasper had 12 points for the Cougars (1-2). Dontavius King added 11 points. ------ For more AP college basketball coverage: https://apnews.com/Collegebasketball and http://twitter.com/AP--Top25 ------ This was generated by Automated Insights, http://www.automatedinsights.com/ap, using data from STATS LLC, https://www.stats.com
